document.full_text: right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori holds a lead over left-wing ollanta humala just two weeks before peru's june 5 presidential election, but pollsters say the race could still be won be either candidate.
document.title: right-wing keiko fujimori leads race in peru polls
lines_and_colors: right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori holds a lead over left-wing ollanta humala just two weeks before peru's june 5 presidential election, but pollsters say the race could still be won be either candidate.
